title: Aleutian World War II National Historic Area: Videos
body: Videos       Video and multimedia stories of the people involved in the War in the Aleutians can be found here.  Â           Makushin   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:2 minutes, 34 seconds  Nikolai Lekanoff, born in 1925, shares his experiences growing up in Makushin and Unalaska, and the pain of forced relocation during World War II, which marked the end of his small village. [open captions]
